subject: Ink & Toner -- Why Pay More
body: Ink & Toner Coupons up to 15% Off - Free Shipping on Select Orders!                         INK722XGExp. 06.30.07         All 100% New Compatible Ink Cartridges          All Other Products (excludes OEM Ink)                          EPSON | LEXMARK | CANON | SAMSUNG | BROTHER | XEROX | HP | and MORE...                    **Orders must be over 50 dollars after discounts, coupons and before tax. Free Shipping offer only valid in the U.S.  To be removed from all future emails for 4inkjets please click here. Please be aware that it may take up to 10 business days for your email address to be removed. You can also send a letter to: 4inkjets, 2500 Grand Ave, Long Beach, CA 90815. If you are still receiving emails 10 business days after unsubscribing please let us know by contacting manager1567@4inkjetsmailer.com.
